snippet.title: Mario Artist Communication Kit Gameplay 64DD
snippet.description:
Mario Artist Communication is not exactly a game nor an art soft. It is basically a communication centre between the 3 other Mario Artists (Talent Studio, Polygon Studio and Paint Studio). It allowed you to send your creations over the internet in order to share it with others and even ask Nintendo for a print out of your best ones. It also included some bonus materials for each of the 3 games, including Zelda artworks.

More 64DD vids in DivX 6 format and 640x480 here : http://web.mac.com/sebangulo/iWeb/Multimedia%2064/Index.html
